knimeNode.name: Spacy NER
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node assigns recognized named entities in the document. Generalized Spacy NE tag set is used.

fullDescription.intro: The node assigns recognized named entities in the document. Generalized Spacy NE tag set is used. Different Spacy models might have different tag sets.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a Document column that will be affected by NER tagging.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official Spacy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.
